entry.title: WIND WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 12:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
